name: Contagion (itch) (Beardstein)
description:
Keep your distance to stay safe.
Even when the walls are closing in.
Sometimes running is your only option. 

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move. Also supports most GAMEPADS.

V0.1 - Mostly done, need to add more audio. Maybe some juice.

V0.2 - Added music and more audio. Ready for submission!

Sounds provided by DOSEONE

Music:

"Lewis and Dekalb" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
